Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Expands the applicability of the assessment exemption for living quarters for parent or grandparent
Summary: Expands the applicability of the assessment exemption for living quarters for parent or grandparent to include living quarters constructed or reconstructed before the effective date of the section providing such exemption.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to expanding the applicability of the assessment exemption for living quarters for parent or grandparent
